name: Hurdler
description:
Hurdler blends frantic platforming action with puzzle solving using intuitive controls. A true classic featured by Apple under "What We're Playing" on itunes back in 2009!

Every young hurdler's goal is to reach the golden balloon at the end of each level. But beware! There are fiendish obstacles along the way. It's up to you to select and time the best jump to clear each hazard. Make a bad decision and suffer a spectacular and embarrassing tumble.

Be on the lookout for springboards strategically located for extra high jump power! You're on your way to becoming a Hurdler Champion!

At the start of each level, Hurdler will start to run by himself toward the goal. Either touch or swipe the screen to perform one of four jumps to clear the obstacles.
Down - Normal Jump
Up - High Jump
Right - Long Jump
Left - Short Hop

Features:
Trash can towers!
Anti-gravity bombs!
Deadly banana peels!
Slapstick stickman violence!
Parallax scrolling!
Original music score that'll leave you dancing...

Features ONLINE HIGH-SCORE BOARDS so you can compete with your friends over 90 levels of Hurdling action!
